summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Greenwood Avenue from Kilbourne Street to No. 50th Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading & curbing under Ordinance No. 15948, creating Local Improvement District No. 1485 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
